00028 #include "StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel.hpp"
00029 #include "PetscTools.hpp"
00030 
00031 StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel()
00032 {
00033 }
00034 
00035 AbstractCellCycleModel* StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::CreateCellCycleModel()
00036 {
00037     // Create a new cell-cycle model
00038     StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel* p_model = new StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel();
00039 
00040     /*
00041      * Set each member variable of the new cell-cycle model that inherits
00042      * its value from the parent.
00043      * 
00044      * Note 1: some of the new cell-cycle model's member variables (namely
00045      * mBirthTime, mCurrentCellCyclePhase, mReadyToDivide) will already have been
00046      * correctly initialized in its constructor.
00047      * 
00048      * Note 2: one or more of the new cell-cycle model's member variables
00049      * may be set/overwritten as soon as InitialiseDaughterCell() is called on
00050      * the new cell-cycle model.
00051      * 
00052      * Note 3: the member variable mDimension remains unset, since this cell-cycle
00053      * model does not need to know the spatial dimension, so if we were to call
00054      * SetDimension() on the new cell-cycle model an exception would be triggered;
00055      * hence we do not set this member variable.
00056      */
00057     p_model->SetBirthTime(mBirthTime);
00058     p_model->SetCellProliferativeType(mCellProliferativeType);
00059     p_model->SetMinimumGapDuration(mMinimumGapDuration);
00060     p_model->SetStemCellG1Duration(mStemCellG1Duration);
00061     p_model->SetTransitCellG1Duration(mTransitCellG1Duration);
00062     p_model->SetSDuration(mSDuration);
00063     p_model->SetG2Duration(mG2Duration);
00064     p_model->SetMDuration(mMDuration);
00065     p_model->SetGeneration(mGeneration);
00066     p_model->SetMaxTransitGenerations(mMaxTransitGenerations);
00067 
00068     return p_model;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::SetG1Duration()
00072 {
00073     assert(mpCell != NULL);
00074 
00075     RandomNumberGenerator* p_gen = RandomNumberGenerator::Instance();
00076 
00077     switch (mCellProliferativeType)
00078     {
00079         case STEM:
00080             mG1Duration = 1 + 4*p_gen->ranf(); // U[1,5] according to Meineke
00081             break;
00082         case TRANSIT:
00083             mG1Duration = 1 + 2*p_gen->ranf(); // U[1,3] according to Meineke
00084             break;
00085         case DIFFERENTIATED:
00086             mG1Duration = DBL_MAX;
00087             break;
00088         default:
00089             NEVER_REACHED;
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00093 void StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::OutputCellCycleModelParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00094 {
00095     // No new parameters to output
00096 
00097     // Call method on direct parent class
00098     AbstractSimpleGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::OutputCellCycleModelParameters(rParamsFile);
00099 }
